title: Explained: How are Chirag Paswan and the LJP placed in Bihar polls?

title: Loan moratorium: SC allows Centre to waive interest on interest, asks for action plan; here's what RBI said in court
description: The had announced a moratorium on repayment of term deposits for 3 months citing COVID-19 pandemic in March. Later it was extended till August 31 to give borrowers more time to clear payments of EMIs, without being classified as NPAs.
